parameters.content:
## LC-RSS-Triage

**Purpose**: Poll RSS feeds every 2 hours, filter for relevance, create intake records

**Default RSS feeds to add to Airtable RSS_Sources table**:
- TechCrunch AI: https://techcrunch.com/category/artificial-intelligence/feed/
- Hacker News (best): https://hnrss.org/best
- The Verge Tech: https://www.theverge.com/rss/tech/index.xml
- Product Hunt: https://www.producthunt.com/feed

**Setup**: Replace PLACEHOLDER IDs with your Airtable base/table IDs
